multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is overfitting?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: When a model starts to represent the training data more than the testing data
When a model is too complex and captures nuances that are not representative of the test data
When a model is too simple and cannot accurately capture the patterns in the data
When a model is trained for too long and starts to memorize the training data
